data.title: Shipping from Afghanistan to Switzerland (from Jurm to Jona) by sea, road, rail and air freight
data.meta_description: Review cargo shipping alternatives by different transport modes between Afghanistan and Switzerland (from Jurm and Jona) based on freight costs, transit times and CO2 emissions.
data.text:
Afghanistan ‚Äî Switzerland All transport modes

Shipping from Asia ‚Ä∫ Afghanistan ‚Ä∫ Jurm to Europe ‚Ä∫ Switzerland ‚Ä∫ Jona

Shipping from (city/country) Shipping to (city/country)

Route via this terminal Avoid enroute (terminal)

Sea Rail Air Road

Freight index 5 783 - 74 720‚Äç

Transit time 7.9 - 33.8 days

CO2 index 1 466 - 62 332‚Äç

Most economical shipping alternative from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland

Jurm

SangtudaTJSANrail yard

1 transshipmentt/s

SingenDESINrail yard

Jona

The cheapest way to ship cargo from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland is to deliver by truck from Jurm to Sangtuda rail yard, transfer to wagon and deliver by rail to Singen rail yard, then deliver by road to final destination in Jona. The route's total transit time is estimated at around 22 days, including loading and unloading operations at origin and destination as well as terminal handling at transit terminals.

Fastest shipping alternative from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland excluding air freight

JurmJona

Without use of air transport, the quickest shipping route from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland is by using road transport for the entire route. The route's total transit time is estimated at around 14 days, including loading and unloading operations at origin and destination.

Another shipping alternative from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland

Jurm

KarachiPKKHIport

GenoaITGOAport

Jona

One other way to transport cargo from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland is to deliver by truck from Jurm to Karachi port, transfer to vessel and ship to Genoa port, then deliver by road to final destination in Jona. The route's total transit time is estimated at around 23 days, including loading and unloading operations at origin and destination as well as terminal handling at transit terminals.

Fastest shipping alternative between Jurm and Jona

Jurm

SrinagarINSXRairport

1 transshipmentt/s

ZurichCHZRHairport

Jona

The quickest method for shipping from Jurm, Afghanistan to Jona, Switzerland is to deliver by truck from Jurm to Srinagar airport, load to aircraft and deliver by air to Zurich airport, then deliver by road to final destination in Jona. The route's total transit time is estimated at around 8 days, including loading and unloading operations at origin and destination as well as terminal handling at transit terminals.
